page.title: 19ATTITUDES - IDEN GREEN
page.content: Comments from our survey revealed that although families in general enjoy the privacy and quiet the area offers for many there is a feeling of caring and sharing. It operates on many levels from neighbourly concern to manning the voluntary services. In a larger community this aid may come from an official source. Here an informal system of support extends throughout all ages and is highly valued. It ranges from taking people by car for hospital treatment to spring cleaning the Church. Fund raising for the wide variety of clubs and societies in the Parish of which Iden Green is a part goes on throughout the year. Many residents are actively involved in this either by running or supporting the coffee mornings, jumble sales, discos and fetes.
